name: MusicPlayer.RepeatMode
desc: The repeat modes for the music player.

items.name: static func == (MusicPlayer.RepeatMode, MusicPlayer.RepeatMode) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.

items.name: case all
items.desc: The music player is repeating the currently playing collection, such as an album or a playlist.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The repeat mode is in a disabled state.

items.name: case one
items.desc: The music player is repeating the currently playing entry.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.
